General.Name: Rollatainers Limited
General.Description: Rollatainers Limited, an integrated packaging company, researches, manufactures, and markets lined and mono cartons and packaging machines in India. The company has a blue chip customer base, which includes Amul, Bacardi, Britannia, Nestle, PepsiCo, Perfetti, Vanmelle, Tata Global Beverages, and Hindustan Unilever. It also exports its products. Rollatainers Limited was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Rewari, India.
